Interface SuspendableCounter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SuspendableVertxCounter
    public interface SuspendableCounter

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      long addAndGet​(long value)
      Add the value to the counter atomically and return the new count
      void close()
      Closes the counter.
      boolean compareAndSet​(long expected, long value)

      • compareAndSet

        @Suspendable
boolean compareAndSet​(long expected,
                      long value)
        Set the counter to the specified value only if the current value is the expectec value. This happens atomically.
        Parameters:
        expected - the expected value
        value - the new value

void close()
        Closes the counter.
